Claim: "A man hugs an infant in a hospital room."
Referring expressions: A man, infant, hospital room.  This baby, born
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsHugged(a,b) and IsInHospitalRoom(c)))) & (forall h (forall f (forall g ( IsHugged(f,g) ->  IsBorn(h))))) & (forall k (forall j (forall i ( IsBorn(i) ->  IsHugged(j,k)))))) -> (exists d (IsBorn(d)))
